verses.text: Now these \add are\add* the \w commandments|strong="H4687"\w*, the \w statutes|strong="H2706"\w*, and the \w judgments|strong="H4941"\w*, which the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* your \w God|strong="H0430"\w* \w commanded|strong="H6680"\w* to \w teach|strong="H3925"\w* you, that ye might \w do|strong="H6213"\w* \add them\add* in the \w land|strong="H0776"\w* whither ye \w go|strong="H5674"\w* to \w possess|strong="H3423"\w* it:\f + \fr 6.1 \ft go: Heb. pass over\f*

That thou mightest \w fear|strong="H3372"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* thy \w God|strong="H0430"\w*, to \w keep|strong="H8104"\w* all his \w statutes|strong="H2708"\w* and his \w commandments|strong="H4687"\w*, which I \w command|strong="H6680"\w* thee, thou, and thy \w son|strong="H1121"\w*, and thy \w son’s|strong="H1121"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w*, all the \w days|strong="H3117"\w* of thy \w life|strong="H2416"\w*; and that thy \w days|strong="H3117"\w* may be \w prolonged|strong="H0748"\w*.

¶ \w Hear|strong="H8085"\w* therefore, O \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, and \w observe|strong="H8104"\w* to \w do|strong="H6213"\w* \add it;\add* that it may be \w well|strong="H3190"\w* with thee, and that ye may \w increase|strong="H7235"\w* \w mightily|strong="H3966"\w*, as the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w God|strong="H0430"\w* of thy \w fathers|strong="H0001"\w* hath \w promised|strong="H1696"\w* thee, in the \w land|strong="H0776"\w* that \w floweth|strong="H2100"\w* with \w milk|strong="H2461"\w* and \w honey|strong="H1706"\w*.

\w Hear|strong="H8085"\w*, O \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*: The 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* our \w God|strong="H0430"\w* \add is\add* \w one|strong="H0259"\w* 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*:

And thou shalt \w love|strong="H0157"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* thy \w God|strong="H0430"\w* with all thine \w heart|strong="H3824"\w*, and with all thy \w soul|strong="H5315"\w*, and with all thy \w might|strong="H3966"\w*.
And these \w words|strong="H1697"\w*, which I \w command|strong="H6680"\w* thee this \w day|strong="H3117"\w*, shall be in thine \w heart|strong="H3824"\w*:

And thou shalt teach them \w diligently|strong="H8150"\w* unto thy \w children|strong="H1121"\w*, and shalt \w talk|strong="H1696"\w* of them when thou \w sittest|strong="H3427"\w* in thine \w house|strong="H1004"\w*, and when thou \w walkest|strong="H3212"\w* by the \w way|strong="H1870"\w*, and when thou liest \w down|strong="H7901"\w*, and when thou risest \w up|strong="H6965"\w*.\f + \fr 6.7 \ft teach: Heb. whet, or, sharpen\f*

And thou shalt \w bind|strong="H7194"\w* them for a \w sign|strong="H0226"\w* upon thine \w hand|strong="H3027"\w*, and they shall be as \w frontlets|strong="H2903"\w* between thine \w eyes|strong="H5869"\w*.
And thou shalt \w write|strong="H3789"\w* them upon the \w posts|strong="H4201"\w* of thy \w house|strong="H1004"\w*, and on thy \w gates|strong="H8179"\w*.

And it shall be, when the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* thy \w God|strong="H0430"\w* shall have \w brought|strong="H0935"\w* thee into the \w land|strong="H0776"\w* which he \w sware|strong="H7650"\w* unto thy \w fathers|strong="H0001"\w*, to \w Abraham|strong="H0085"\w*, to \w Isaac|strong="H3327"\w*, and to \w Jacob|strong="H3290"\w*, to \w give|strong="H5414"\w* thee \w great|strong="H1419"\w* and \w goodly|strong="H2896"\w* \w cities|strong="H5892"\w*, which thou \w buildedst|strong="H1129"\w* not,

And \w houses|strong="H1004"\w* \w full|strong="H4392"\w* of all \w good|strong="H2898"\w* \add things\add*, which thou \w filledst|strong="H4390"\w* not, and \w wells|strong="H0953"\w* \w digged|strong="H2672"\w*, which thou \w diggedst|strong="H2672"\w* not, \w vineyards|strong="H3754"\w* and olive \w trees|strong="H2132"\w*, which thou \w plantedst|strong="H5193"\w* not; when thou shalt have \w eaten|strong="H0398"\w* and be \w full|strong="H7646"\w*;

\add Then\add* \w beware|strong="H8104"\w* lest thou \w forget|strong="H7911"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, which brought thee \w forth|strong="H3318"\w* out of the \w land|strong="H0776"\w* of \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w*, from the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of \w bondage|strong="H5650"\w*.\f + \fr 6.12 \ft bondage: Heb. bondmen or, servants\f*

Thou shalt \w fear|strong="H3372"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* thy \w God|strong="H0430"\w*, and \w serve|strong="H5647"\w* him, and shalt \w swear|strong="H7650"\w* by his \w name|strong="H8034"\w*.

Ye shall not \w go|strong="H3212"\w* \w after|strong="H0310"\w* \w other|strong="H0312"\w* \w gods|strong="H0430"\w*, of the \w gods|strong="H0430"\w* of the \w people|strong="H5971"\w* which \add are\add* round \w about|strong="H5439"\w* you;

(For the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* thy \w God|strong="H0430"\w* \add is\add* a \w jealous|strong="H7067"\w* \w God|strong="H0410"\w* \w among|strong="H7130"\w* you) lest the \w anger|strong="H0639"\w* of the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* thy \w God|strong="H0430"\w* be \w kindled|strong="H2734"\w* against thee, and \w destroy|strong="H8045"\w* thee from off the \w face|strong="H6440"\w* of the \w earth|strong="H0127"\w*.
¶ Ye shall not \w tempt|strong="H5254"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* your \w God|strong="H0430"\w*, as ye \w tempted|strong="H5254"\w* \add him\add* in \w Massah|strong="H4532"\w*.

Ye shall \w diligently|strong="H8104"\w* \w keep|strong="H8104"\w* the \w commandments|strong="H4687"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* your \w God|strong="H0430"\w*, and his \w testimonies|strong="H5713"\w*, and his \w statutes|strong="H2706"\w*, which he hath \w commanded|strong="H6680"\w* thee.

And thou shalt \w do|strong="H6213"\w* \add that which is\add* \w right|strong="H3477"\w* and \w good|strong="H2896"\w* in the \w sight|strong="H5869"\w* of the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*: that it may be \w well|strong="H3190"\w* with thee, and that thou mayest go \w in|strong="H0935"\w* and \w possess|strong="H3423"\w* the \w good|strong="H2896"\w* \w land|strong="H0776"\w* which the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* \w sware|strong="H7650"\w* unto thy \w fathers|strong="H0001"\w*,
To cast \w out|strong="H1920"\w* all thine \w enemies|strong="H0341"\w* from \w before|strong="H6440"\w* thee, as the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* hath \w spoken|strong="H1696"\w*.

\add And\add* when thy \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w asketh|strong="H7592"\w* thee in time to \w come|strong="H4279"\w*, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*, What \add mean\add* the \w testimonies|strong="H5713"\w*, and the \w statutes|strong="H2706"\w*, and the \w judgments|strong="H4941"\w*, which the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* our \w God|strong="H0430"\w* hath \w commanded|strong="H6680"\w* you?\f + \fr 6.20 \ft in…: Heb. to morrow\f*

Then thou shalt \w say|strong="H0559"\w* unto thy \w son|strong="H1121"\w*, We were \w Pharaoh’s|strong="H6547"\w* \w bondmen|strong="H5650"\w* in \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w*; and the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* brought us \w out|strong="H3318"\w* of \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w* with a \w mighty|strong="H2389"\w* \w hand|strong="H3027"\w*:

And the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w shewed|strong="H5414"\w* \w signs|strong="H0226"\w* and \w wonders|strong="H4159"\w*, \w great|strong="H1419"\w* and \w sore|strong="H7451"\w*, upon \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w*, upon \w Pharaoh|strong="H6547"\w*, and upon all his \w household|strong="H1004"\w*, before our \w eyes|strong="H5869"\w*:\f + \fr 6.22 \ft sore: Heb. evil\f*

And he brought us \w out|strong="H3318"\w* from thence, that he might bring us \w in|strong="H0935"\w*, to \w give|strong="H5414"\w* us the \w land|strong="H0776"\w* which he \w sware|strong="H7650"\w* unto our \w fathers|strong="H0001"\w*.

And the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* \w commanded|strong="H6680"\w* us to \w do|strong="H6213"\w* all these \w statutes|strong="H2706"\w*, to \w fear|strong="H3372"\w* the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* our \w God|strong="H0430"\w*, for our \w good|strong="H2896"\w* \w always|strong="H3117"\w*, that he might preserve us \w alive|strong="H2421"\w*, as \add it is\add* at this \w day|strong="H3117"\w*.

And it shall be our \w righteousness|strong="H6666"\w*, if we \w observe|strong="H8104"\w* to \w do|strong="H6213"\w* all \w these|strong="H2063"\w* \w commandments|strong="H4687"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* our \w God|strong="H0430"\w*, as he hath \w commanded|strong="H6680"\w* us.
